sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) cart.prices = [['Items',0], ['Shipping',0], ['Tax',0], ['Total',0]]; cart.prices[0][1] = (cart.cartItems.reduce((acc,item) => acc += (item.price * item.qty),0)).toFixed(2); cart.prices[1][1] = (cart.prices[0]> 2000 ? 0 : 200).toFixed(2) cart.prices[2][1] = Number((0.05) * (cart.prices.Items)).toFixed(2); cart.prices[3][1] = (Number(cart.prices[0][1]) + Number(cart.prices[1][1]) + Number(cart.prices[2][1])).toFixed(2); const placeOrder = () => { console.log('Placed Order') } return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{ cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your Cart is Empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item,index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X Rs.{item.price} = Rs.{(item.price * item.qty ).toFixed(2) } ))} ) }

Order Summary

{cart.prices.map((items)=> ( {items[0]} : {items[1]} ))} {/* Items: Rs. {cart.prices.Items} Shipping: Rs. {cart.prices.Shipping} Tax: Rs.{cart.prices.Tax} Total: Rs.{cart.prices.Total} */}
); } export default PlaceOrderScreen;
